live_qa_examples.q: FANG vs startup vs remote — best kya hai?
live_qa_examples.a: Pehle offers table pe lao, phir compare. Agar offers nahi, toh strategy alag: skills sharpen, 3–5 solid projects, strong GitHub, targeted networking. Best option wo hai jo aapke goals (learning speed, ownership, compensation, visa/on-site) ke closest ho.
Dono. DSA interview unlock karta hai; projects job sustain karwate hain. Balance rakho: weekdays DSA, weekends project shipping.
Bilkul nahi. 6–8 months focused roadmap follow karo (MERN/DevOps/GenAI). 3–4 polished projects + GitHub hygiene = interviews khul jaate hain.

qa_library.title: JavaScript Closures
qa_library.answer: Closure = inner function ke paas outer scope ka access hota hai even after outer function returns. Private state ke liye perfect.
qa_library.code: function makeCounter(){let c=0;return()=>++c;} const a=makeCounter(); a(); a();

qa_library.title: React Performance
qa_library.answer: Profiler se bottleneck pakdo, unnecessary re-renders roko (memo/useMemo/useCallback), code-splitting karo, bundle analyzer chalao.

qa_library.title: Prod API works locally only
qa_library.answer: Env diff check karo (CORS, HTTPS, env vars, DB IP whitelist). Network tab + server logs + Postman se trace karo. Proper error logging mandatory.

qa_library.title: Full-stack roadmap
qa_library.answer: JS fundamentals → React → Node+Express → Mongo/Postgres → Auth, uploads, deploy → 3 real projects (readme + live demo).

qa_library.title: GenAI ka entry path
qa_library.answer: Python/JS basics → LLM fundamentals → RAG (vector DB, embeddings) → tools & agents → shipping tiny AI features in existing apps.
